title: Come the Morning
description: Set against the backdrop of twelfth-century Scotland, a sweeping epic details the story of Waryk de Graham, a loyal warrior to King David, and his reluctant bride, Mellyora MacAdin, the woman chosen for him whose heart belongs to another, and as Mellyora succumbs to Waryk's tender embrace, she must decide whether her loyalty lies with her family or her husband.
author: Shannon Drake
